info.title: Captain Data MCP API
info.description: API for managing Captain Data actions and flows

apiKey.name: X-API-Key
apiKey.description: Direct Captain Data API key for authentication

get.description: Check if the API is running

message.example: Captain Data MCP API is running

post.summary: Authenticate with your Captain Data API key
post.description: Exchange your Captain Data API key for a session token that can be used for subsequent requests

session_token.description: Session token to use in Authorization header for subsequent requests

get.description: Get metadata about available tools (MCP introspection)

parameters.name: v
parameters.description: Version parameter. Use "full" to get all tools

post.description: Extract detailed information from a LinkedIn profile. Use this when you need comprehensive data about a person including their work history, education, skills, and achievements. Perfect for lead research, candidate evaluation, or networking preparation.

linkedin_profile_url.description: The LinkedIn profile URL to extract data from. Must be a valid LinkedIn URL starting with 'https://www.linkedin.com/sales/people/', 'https://www.linkedin.com/sales/lead/', 'https://www.linkedin.com/pub/' or 'https://www.linkedin.com/in/'

sections.description: Include education, certifications, and other profile sections in the results

experiences.description: Include detailed work experience and employment history

skills.description: Include skills, endorsements, and expertise areas

highlights.description: Include highlights, achievements, and notable accomplishments

post.description: Extract comprehensive company information from LinkedIn. Use this when you need detailed data about a company including size, industry, location, and key insights. Ideal for market research, competitive analysis, or B2B prospecting.

linkedin_company_url.description: The LinkedIn company page URL to extract data from. Must be a valid LinkedIn URL starting with 'https://www.linkedin.com/sales/company', 'https://www.linkedin.com/showcase', 'https://www.linkedin.com/company' or 'https://www.linkedin.com/school'

post.description: Search for people using LinkedIn Sales Navigator. Use this when you need to find potential leads, candidates, or contacts based on specific criteria like job title, company, location, or skills. Great for building prospect lists or finding experts in a particular field.

search_url.description: The Sales Navigator search URL with your desired filters and criteria. Must start with 'https://www.linkedin.com/sales/search/people'

page.description: Page number for pagination, starting at 1

post.description: Search for companies using LinkedIn Sales Navigator. Use this when you need to find target companies based on industry, size, location, or other criteria. Perfect for market research, competitive analysis, or identifying potential business partners.

search_url.description: The Sales Navigator company search URL with your desired filters and criteria. Must start with 'https://www.linkedin.com/sales/search/company'

page.description: Page number for pagination, starting at 1

post.description: Find employees of a specific company using LinkedIn Sales Navigator. Use this when you need to identify key decision makers, potential contacts, or understand the organizational structure of a target company. Ideal for account-based marketing or sales prospecting.

sales_navigator_company_url.description: The Sales Navigator company page URL. Must start with 'https://www.linkedin.com/sales/company/'. Provide either this URL or the company ID.

linkedin_company_id.description: The LinkedIn company ID (alternative to providing the company URL). Provide either this ID or the company URL.

post.description: Execute a Captain Data tool by alias
